languages.text: "В этот раз я не позволю вам потерять здесь ни одной лишней секунды, шерин! Долой смирение и правила — сегодня мы доберемся до этого Троном проклятого заверителя и получим Меркатум Табула Официале!" {n}Многозначительно улыбаясь, Джай косится на вас, ожидая дальнейшей реакции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В этот раз я не позволю вам потерять здесь ни одной лишней секунды, шерин! Долой смирение и правила — сегодня мы доберемся до этого Троном проклятого заверителя и получим Меркатум Табула Официале!" {n}Многозначительно улыбаясь, Джай косится на вас, ожидая дальнейшей реакции.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В этот раз я не позволю вам потерять здесь ни одной лишней секунды, шерин! Долой смирение и правила — сегодня мы доберемся до этого Троном проклятого заверителя и получим Меркатум Табула Официале!" {n}Многозначительно улыбаясь, Джай косится на вас, ожидая дальнейшей реакции.{/n}

Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这次我绝不会让你多浪费一秒钟的时间，亲爱的！没必要浪费的时间绝不浪费！我们不会再耐心等待了！也不会再按部就班了！今天，我们要冲到那个被黄金王座诅咒的破窗口，把帝国官方行商执照搞到手！”{n}婕伊脸上挂着尖锐的微笑，瞥了你一眼，等待着你的回应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这次我绝不会让你多浪费一秒钟的时间，亲爱的！没必要浪费的时间绝不浪费！我们不会再耐心等待了！也不会再按部就班了！今天，我们要冲到那个被黄金王座诅咒的破窗口，把帝国官方行商执照搞到手！”{n}婕伊脸上挂着尖锐的微笑，瞥了你一眼，等待着你的回应。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Esta vez no permitiré que pasemos aquí ni un segundo más de lo estrictamente necesario, shereen! ¡Se acabó lo de ser pacientes! ¡Se acabaron las normas! ¡Hoy vamos a llegar a esa condenada ventanilla y vamos a conseguir la Mercatum Tabula Officiale!». {n}Con una sonrisa mordaz, Jae te mira y espera tu respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta vez no permitiré que pasemos aquí ni un segundo más de lo estrictamente necesario, shereen! ¡Se acabó lo de ser pacientes! ¡Se acabaron las normas! ¡Hoy vamos a llegar a esa condenada ventanilla y vamos a conseguir la Mercatum Tabula Officiale!». {n}Con una sonrisa mordaz, Jae te mira y espera tu respuesta.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「今回は何が何でも必要以上に1秒たりとも長くいるつもりはないからね、シャリーン！もう我慢ならないわ！ルールに従うなんてまっぴらよ！今日はあの王座の呪いを受けた窓口までたどり着いて、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れるんだから！」{n}ジェイはわざとらしい笑みを浮かべると、こちらを一瞥して返事を待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「今回は何が何でも必要以上に1秒たりとも長くいるつもりはないからね、シャリーン！もう我慢ならないわ！ルールに従うなんてまっぴらよ！今日はあの王座の呪いを受けた窓口までたどり着いて、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを手に入れるんだから！」{n}ジェイはわざとらしい笑みを浮かべると、こちらを一瞥して返事を待っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Cette fois-ci, je ne vous laisserai pas passer ici une seconde de plus que nécessaire, shereen ! Au diable le règlement, l'heure n'est plus à la patience ! C'est décidé : aujourd'hui, nous allons atteindre ce maudit guichet et obtenir ma Mercatum Tabula Officiale ! » {n}Un sourire acerbe aux lèvres, Jae vous regarde en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette fois-ci, je ne vous laisserai pas passer ici une seconde de plus que nécessaire, shereen ! Au diable le règlement, l'heure n'est plus à la patience ! C'est décidé : aujourd'hui, nous allons atteindre ce maudit guichet et obtenir ma Mercatum Tabula Officiale ! » {n}Un sourire acerbe aux lèvres, Jae vous regarde en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Diesmal erlaube ich Euch nicht, auch nur eine Sekunde länger als unbedingt erforderlich hier zu verweilen, Shereen! Keine Geduld mehr! Kein Beachten der Regeln! Heute schaffen wir es zu diesem Thron-verfluchten Fenster und holen uns das Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}Jae sieht dich lächelnd an und wartet auf deine Reaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diesmal erlaube ich Euch nicht, auch nur eine Sekunde länger als unbedingt erforderlich hier zu verweilen, Shereen! Keine Geduld mehr! Kein Beachten der Regeln! Heute schaffen wir es zu diesem Thron-verfluchten Fenster und holen uns das Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}Jae sieht dich lächelnd an und wartet auf deine Reaktion.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu kez burada fazladan tek bir saniye bile harcamayacağız şirinim! Artık sabır mabır yok! Kurallara uymak yok! Bugün Taht'ın unuttuğu o bankoya gidip Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi alacağız!" {n}Anlamlı bir gülümseyişle sana bakan Jae, cevabını bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This time, I will not allow you to spend one second longer here than absolutely necessary, shereen! No more being patient! No more playing by the rules! Today we are going to make it to that Throne-cursed window and we're going to get the Mercatum Tabula Officiale!" {n}With a pointed smile, Jae glances at you, awaiting your response.{/n}
